alert.note: Alert for Alamance; Durham; Orange; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 10:15AM EDT until April 22 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Alamance County in central North Carolina... Person County in central North Carolina... Orange County in central North Carolina... Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1014 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hightowers to near Mebane to 7 miles northeast of Siler City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. There have been reports from spotters of penny sized hail and tree damage from the line. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Durham, Chapel Hill, Graham, Roxboro, Hillsborough, Carrboro, Mebane, Rougemont, Concord and Haw River. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
